sentences.en: A sand moisture automatic control system for foundry is introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了一种用于铸造车间的型砂水分自动控制系统.

sentences.en: All processes operated in the foundry workshop can be quantified.
sentences.cn: 铸造车间运作的所有流程(过程)都是可以量化的.

sentences.en: Botou known as China's reputation as a foundry town.
sentences.cn: 中国泊头素有铸造之乡的美誉.

sentences.en: Cannon Foundry: Cannons are made here from pig iron and wood.
sentences.cn: 大炮制造厂: 在这里把生铁和木头制成大炮.

sentences.en: Chemical Supplies, Scrap, Foundry, Metallurgy, Metal, Scrap, Chemicals and Other Related Products.
sentences.cn: 采购产品化学品, 小片, 铸造, 冶金, 金属, 小片, 化学药品.

sentences.en: Familiar with cost analysis of machining foundry etc. technology.
sentences.cn: 熟悉机加、铸造等加工工艺的成本分析.

sentences.en: Fang Yuan Tie Yi is a professional enterprise in foundry 、 vendition 、 design 、 installation.
sentences.cn: 方圆铁艺是一家集铸造、销售、设计、安装于一体的专业企业.

sentences.en: He's turned off from the foundry.
sentences.cn: 他已经被那个铁工厂解雇了.

sentences.en: Industries, mainly the fire industry, foundry industry, and pure water production.
sentences.cn: 工业方面主要有消防工业 、 铸造业和纯净水生产.

sentences.en: Reasons of forming first cracks were foundry lacuna, impurity gathering , lard exiting.
sentences.cn: 铸造缺陷 、 杂质元素偏聚和夹杂物的存在是形成早期裂纹源的原因.

sentences.en: Tell the foundry to cast another piston.
sentences.cn: 告诉铸铁间再铸一只活塞.

sentences.en: The foundry has successfully awarded the ISO 9001:2000 Quality Management System Certificate.
sentences.cn: 该厂已成功荣获ISO9001:2000质量管理体系认证证书.

sentences.en: The moulds for the foundry are made in the tool-room area.
sentences.cn: 铸造车间的模具是在工具间生产的。

sentences.en: Township enterprises have iron, foundry, cement, chemicals, paint and other plants.
sentences.cn: 乡镇企业有冶铁 、 铸造 、 水泥 、 化工 、 涂料等厂.

trans.tran_en: a place where metals are melted and poured into  mould s (= hollow shapes )  to make parts for machines, tools etc
